characterDescription:
Fin is a darkeyed youth of about twelve years old. He is a groom who works for King Elhokar.
Fin explains to Sadeas (with Adolin in listening distance) that he had prepared the King's saddle on the day of the chasmfiend hunt before it was turned over to Dalinar's men. However, when he saw the King's head grooms take the horse later to Dalinar's warcamp, it was wearing a different saddle.
